citation_details.title: Multimodal pathophysiological dataset of gradual cerebral ischemia in a cohort of juvenile pigs
citation_details.author: MG Frasch, B Walter, CL Herry, R Bauer
citation_details.abstract: Ischemic brain injuries are frequent and difficult to detect reliably or early. We present the  multi-modal data set containing cardiovascular (blood pressure, blood flow, electrocardiogram)
citation_details.short_author: MG Frasch, B Walter, CL Herry, R Bauer

citation_details.title: Corticothalamic communication under analgesia, sedation and gradual ischemia: a multimodal model of controlled gradual cerebral ischemia in pig
citation_details.author: MG Frasch, B Walter, CL Herry, R Bauer
citation_details.short_author: MG Frasch, B Walter, CL Herry, R Bauer
